pros: Clients and families. Clean building, decent access to supplies. Classroom teams can be incredibly supportive and productive. Regular and prompt behavior support when needed.
cons: Salaries are incredibly low with little to no advancement opportunities. Aging ABA practices. Lack of consistency in leadership and staff.

pros: Good support from staff and competitive salary

pros: Amazing experience, kids and families are very involved, lots of support in the workplace.

pros: Amazing place to work and learn, you are given unlimited access to support. Great people, working like a family.

pros: Incredible staff and great employee benefits with overtime opportunities. Being a smaller private school allows more personalized learning for students based on individual needs.

review_title: They offer the best socil security services in zimbabwe
pros: Able to give pension to pensioners after retirement and compensation after injury at the workplace
cons: Sometimes pensioners do not receive their pensions in time due to system failure

pros: A large organisation with a pool of records that has enabled attaining of knowledge in records and information management

review_title: My experience at nssa was disapointing.
pros: The only pro is the ability to help the children you are teaching, which is gratifying. Don't expect anything more.
cons: Management is totally disconnected from employees. They promise training and then never give it. Employees openly talk about how they do not like their jobs. No motivation or incentives.
